title: Drawing, "Round Table", ca. 1932
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 1658, H./S.D/ 5/4, 5/4, A.T.B.
description: Plan, elevation, and perspective drawing for small round table. Circular top with four, squared legs curved at bottom, connected to circular base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Round Table", ca. 1932.
ca. 1932. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-650.
